analysis: The project needs an Egyptian-themed UI with light desert colors, mobile responsiveness, and functional buttons. The existing files show a basic structure but lack the Egyptian theme, proper mobile navigation, and functional buttons.

improvements.description: Update the CSS file with Egyptian-themed color palette (sandy beige, warm browns, gold accents) and UI elements to reflect a desert aesthetic.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Fix the mobile menu toggle functionality with proper event handling, smooth transitions, and user-friendly interactions.
Ensure all buttons are functional and styled to match the Egyptian theme.
